text: James Harness (born April 6, 1934) is a former American football player who played for Baltimore Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Mississippi State University. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dyersburg, Tennessee Category:Players of American football from Tennessee Category:American football defensive backs Category:Mississippi State Bulldogs football players Category:Baltimore Colts players
title: Jim Harness
